inventory availability by sales order

section.para: To view Inventory Availability by Sales Order, select the "Inventory Availability by Sales Order" option. The following screen will appear:
When displaying Inventory Availability by Sales Order, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Enter the Sales Order Number of the Sales Order whose Availability you want to view.
Displays the date the Sales Order was placed.
Select to only show Inventory shortages in display. A shortage describes Inventory quantity whose Availability is negative.

varlistentry.term: sales orders reservations for Use Reservation Netting

listitem.para: Select to show Sales Order Reservations (if any) for the Sales Order Items included in the display. When selected, the "This Availability" column will dynamically change to "This Reservation" and the quantity reserved for each Sales Order Item (if any) will be shown. This option will not be visible if Sales Order reservations are not enabled at your site.

tip.para: To manipulate Sales Order Reservations by Line Item, see the options available in the right-click menu. These options will not be visible if Sales Order Reservations are not enabled at your site.

listitem.para: Select to include current Work Orders for the Sales Order Items shown in the display. If current Work Orders exist, they will appear nested below each relevant Sales Order Item.

Display lists Inventory Availability by Sales Order, using the specified parameters. If an available quantity value displays in the color orange, this means the actual or projected Quantity on Hand is at or below the Reorder Level. If the color is red, the current or projected Quantity on Hand is below 0.

note.para: The display features additional color-coding to help easily identify the Sales Order Reservation status of individual Orders and also Line Items. The following color conventions are used:

listitem.para: Green (Line Item level): Line Item quantity is fully-reserved.
Green (Header level): Sales Order has been added to the Packing List Batch
Blue: Line Item quantity is partially-reserved.
Black: Line Item has no Sales Order reservations.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen, returning you to the application desktop.
Runs the report associated with this screen.
Select to automatically update the information displayed in the screen. The list will automatically update every 60 seconds if this option is selected.
